name: Kodansha Learner's Course Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: に従って
cards.meaning: in accordance with...; in proportion to...

cards.question: の為に
cards.meaning: for the sake of...; so that...

cards.question: ○をつける
cards.meaning: mark (an answer) with a circle mark; mark as correct

cards.question: アメリカ合衆国
answer: あめりかがっしゅうこく
アメリカがっしゅうこく

cards.question: お客さん
cards.meaning: visitor, guest; customer, client; spectator; passenger; outsider

cards.question: お膳
cards.meaning: low four-legged tray for serving food

cards.question: お酒
cards.meaning: sake; alcoholic drink, wine, liquor, beer

cards.question: カロリーの摂取量
answer: かろりいのせっしゅりょう
カロリーのせっしゅりょう

cards.question: コップを水で満たす
answer: こっぷをみずでみたす
コップをみずでみたす

cards.question: ご無沙汰しております
answer: ごぶさたしております
cards.meaning: [polite] I haven't seen you [been in contact with you] for a long time

cards.question: ご馳走様でした
cards.meaning: [polite way of thanking someone for a meal or other hospitality]

cards.question: その外
cards.meaning: besides, in addition; the rest, others

cards.question: その点について
cards.meaning: on that point, in that respect

cards.question: その点に於いて
cards.meaning: on that point, in that regard

cards.question: その筈だ
cards.meaning: That is to be expected, You would think so

cards.question: どこに住んでいますか
answer: どこにすんでいますか

cards.question: バスの停留所
answer: ばすのていりゅうじょ
バスのていりゅうじょ

cards.question: ポン酢
cards.meaning: ponzu (sauce made from soy sauce and citrus juice)

cards.question: ワ冠
cards.meaning: wa (ワ)-shaped grapheme atop certain kanji (such as 冠)

cards.question: 一息
cards.meaning: breath; pause, rest; a little bit of effort

cards.question: 一斉に
cards.meaning: all together, all at once, simultaneously

cards.question: 一日当たり千円
answer: いちにちあたりせんえん

cards.question: 一旦
cards.meaning: once; for a while; one morning

cards.question: 一昨年辺り
cards.meaning: the year before last or thereabouts

cards.question: 一杯
cards.meaning: a cup (as of tea), a glass (as of beer)

cards.question: 一石二鳥
cards.meaning: kill two birds with one stone

cards.question: 一緒に
cards.meaning: together; at the same time; in a lump

cards.question: 一部
cards.meaning: part, portion, section; a copy (of printed matter)

cards.question: 七五三
cards.meaning: the lucky numbers (7-5-3); festival for children of three, five, and seven

cards.question: 万里の長城
answer: ばんりのちょうじょう

cards.question: 三つ巴
cards.meaning: circular pattern of three commas; three-sided fight

cards.question: 三百六十五日
answer: さんびゃくろくじゅうごにち

cards.question: 上下
cards.meaning: high and low; rise and fall; first and second (volumes)

cards.question: 上旬
cards.meaning: first ten days of a month

cards.question: 上級
cards.meaning: higher grade, advanced class, high class

cards.question: 下旬
cards.meaning: final ten days of a month

cards.question: 下町
cards.meaning: (downtown) business quarters, old part of Tokyo

cards.question: 与る
cards.meaning: participate, share in; receive, be given

cards.question: 世界観
cards.meaning: world view, outlook on the world

cards.question: 世間
cards.meaning: society, the world; the public, people

cards.question: 並べる
cards.meaning: [vt] line up, place in order; enumerate

cards.question: 並行
cards.meaning: parallel, going side by side; occurring together

cards.question: 中に
cards.meaning: in; in the middle of; between, among

cards.question: 中旬

cards.question: 乱れる
cards.meaning: be disordered, be confused; be chaotic

cards.question: 五大湖
cards.meaning: The Great Lakes (Lakes Superior, Michigan, Huron, Ontario and Erie)

cards.question: 些とも面白くない
answer: ちっともおもしろくない

cards.question: 亡者
cards.meaning: the dead, the deceased; a ghost

cards.question: 人に対して親切

cards.question: 今まで
cards.meaning: till now, so far, up to the present

cards.question: 今昔
cards.meaning: past and present, yesterday and today

cards.question: 介する
cards.meaning: go via, through proxy; worry, mind, care

cards.meaning: doer; protagonist in a noh drama

cards.question: 付ける

cards.question: 以上
cards.meaning: not less than; beyond; the above-mentioned; now that; that's all

cards.question: 以下
cards.meaning: not more than, under; the following

cards.question: 以後
cards.meaning: after this, from now on, in future; thereafter

cards.question: 任せる
cards.meaning: leave (up) to, entrust with; leave alone

cards.question: 伏せる
cards.meaning: turn downward, lay upside down, turn over

cards.question: 休み
cards.meaning: rest, recess; suspension; vacation, holiday; absence

cards.question: 伺い

cards.question: 伺う
cards.meaning: inquire (about), be told; pay a visit

cards.question: 但し
cards.meaning: provided that, on condition that, however, but, only

cards.question: 体たらく
cards.meaning: a nasty state of affairs, a mess, a plight

cards.question: 供える
cards.meaning: offer (to a god), make an offering

cards.question: 依頼する
cards.meaning: request; commission; rely on, depend on

cards.question: 侮る

cards.question: 信頼する

cards.question: 借りる

cards.question: 催す

cards.question: 償う

cards.question: 元々
cards.meaning: originally, from the first; by nature

cards.question: 先
cards.meaning: point, tip; the future; destination; first, ahead of; before, earlier

cards.question: 入る
cards.meaning: はいる: enter; join; contain; have; begin; いる: enter.

cards.question: 入れる
cards.meaning: put in, let in; accommodate; accept

cards.question: 六五○円
answer: ろっぴゃくごじゅうえん

cards.question: 兵

cards.question: 写真に写る

cards.question: 冥福

cards.question: 凝る

cards.question: 処する
cards.meaning: deal with, dispose of; to sentence

cards.question: 処理する

cards.question: 出る
cards.meaning: go out, depart; go to, be present

cards.question: 切迫する
cards.meaning: draw near, press; become acute, grow tense

cards.question: 初詣
cards.meaning: one's first visit to a temple [shrine] in the new year

cards.question: 利害
cards.meaning: interests, what one stands to gain or lose

cards.question: 刹那
cards.meaning: a moment, an instant, a juncture

cards.question: 刺身
cards.meaning: sashimi, sliced raw flesh (esp. of fish)

cards.question: 刻む
cards.meaning: cut fine; engrave, carve; (of a clock) tick away

cards.question: 則る

cards.question: 前途

cards.question: 剣を帯びる
cards.meaning: wear a sword at one's side

cards.question: 加減
cards.meaning: addition and subtraction; degree, extent; adjustment

cards.question: 労う

cards.question: 労る

cards.question: 勃起する
cards.meaning: well up; stiffen, have an erection

cards.question: 勇む

cards.question: 勉強の傍らに音楽を聞く

cards.question: 動じる

cards.question: 務める

cards.question: 包む
